ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.

direction.description: Determines the sort order of logs.

end.description:
The end of the time window in any format supported by
https://github.com/araddon/dateparse.

endRelative.description: The relative end of the time window as time.Duration.

limit.description: the number of results to return.

start.description:
The start of the time window in any format supported by
https://github.com/araddon/dateparse.

startRelative.description: The relative start of the time window as time.Duration.
